translated: Instantly, in the emptiness of the body by nature, one is Cakrasa·πÉvara with the right leg extended, standing on a variegated lotus, sun, Bhairava, and KƒÅlarƒÅtri, with vajra and bell in one's hands,

translated: He has two hands holding a vajra and a skull cup filled with lotuses.üîΩHe has a skull crown and a garland of dry heads hanging from his neck.üîΩHe has the five symbolic ornaments.

original: dbu stha sngon po'i tshogs grol zhing 'khyil ba /
analyzed: dbu stha sngon po'i tshogs grol zhing 'khyil ba /
translated: His hair is dark blue, tied in a topknot, and coiled.

original: spyan gsum pa me tog bandhu ka lta bu'i rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud cing mtsho skyes dang gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa me tog bandhu ka lta bu'i rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud cing mtsho skyes dang gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa /
translated: He has three eyes and embraces VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´, who is like a bandhuka flower. He is in union with the Lake-Born Goddess.

original: me tog kanda li kha bye ma thug gi kha dog mdzes pa /
analyzed: me tog kanda li kha bye ma thug gi kha dog mdzes pa /
translated: He is beautiful, like a freshly opened kanerika flower.

original: gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs can /
analyzed: gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs can /
translated: He has the assembly of the nine dramatic moods.

original: ral pa nag po'i thor tshugs brdzes pa'i rtse mor nor bu dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes //
analyzed: ral pa nag po'i thor tshugs brdzes pa'i rtse mor nor bu dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes //
translated: His black hair is tied in a topknot, adorned with a jewel and a crossed vajra.

original: bde'i 'og tu g-yon du bsil 'od can gyi cha gnas pa /
analyzed: bde'i 'og tu g-yon du bsil 'od can gyi cha gnas pa /
translated: Below that, on his left, is the moon.

original: gdan sna tshogs rdo rje la thub pa mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
analyzed: gdan sna tshogs rdo rje la thub pa mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
translated: On the variegated vajra seat is the Muni Ak·π£obhya.

original: dpral ba'i mtha'i gnas su thod pa lngas brgyan pa phyag rgya drug pa /
analyzed: dpral ba'i mtha'i gnas su thod pa lngas brgyan pa phyag rgya drug pa /
translated: On the forehead is a crest of five skulls, and he has the six symbolic ornaments.

original: rlan dang bcas pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng bas sku rnam par mdzes pa /
analyzed: rlan dang bcas pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng bas sku rnam par mdzes pa /
translated: His body is beautified by a garland of fifty fresh human heads.

original: mdzes ma'i mchu'i sbrang rtsi'i btung ba'i ro dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mdzes ma'i mchu'i sbrang rtsi'i btung ba'i ro dang ldan pa /
translated: He has the taste of drinking the honey of a beautiful woman's lips.

original: spyan gsum pa zhal gcig pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa zhal gcig pa /
translated: He has three eyes and one face.üîΩIn the heart of Sri Heruka is a sun with a blue hum, which is of the same nature as oneself.

original: dpal gyi thugs kar gnas pa'i nyi ma h'um sngon po rang bcas pa'i bdag nyid dang rog gcig pa nyid kyis rang dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba brtan pa dang bcas pa'i g-yo ba bcom ldan 'das ma la'o //
analyzed: dpal gyi thugs kar gnas pa'i nyi ma h'um sngon po rang bcas pa'i bdag nyid dang rog gcig pa nyid kyis rang dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba brtan pa dang bcas pa'i g-yo ba bcom ldan 'das ma la'o //
translated: The moving and unmoving beings equal to oneself are in Bhagavati.

original: de'i thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das la'o //üîΩde bdag nyid gdan dang bcas pa thugs ga'i nyi ma dang bcas pa h'um gi rnam pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das la'o // de bdag nyid gdan dang bcas pa thugs ga'i nyi ma dang bcas pa h'um gi rnam pa la'o //
translated: Her great compassion is in Bhagavan.üîΩHe, with his seat, is in the heart sun with the form of hum.

original: de don yod grub pa'i ngo bo au'i rnam pa ni 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin ha'i rnam pa la'o //
analyzed: de don yod grub pa'i ngo bo au'i rnam pa ni 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin ha'i rnam pa la'o //
translated: That is Amoghasiddhi's nature, which is in the form of u, which is in the form of ha, which is Amitabha's nature.

original: de rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo mgo bo'i ri mo la'o //
analyzed: de rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo mgo bo'i ri mo la'o //
translated: That is in the crest-jewel, which is the essence of Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin zla tshes la'o //
analyzed: de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin zla tshes la'o //
translated: That is in the crescent moon, which is the nature of Vairocana.

original: de mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin n'a da dang bcas pa'i thig le la'o //
analyzed: de mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin n'a da dang bcas pa'i thig le la'o //
translated: That is in the drop with the nada, which is the nature of Ak·π£obhya.

original: de n'a da la'o //
analyzed: de n'a da la'o //
translated: That is in the nada.

original: de yang rim gyis bsdus pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo chos kyi sku @251a * //
analyzed: de yang rim gyis bsdus pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo chos kyi sku @251a * //
translated: That also is gradually withdrawn into the essence of Vajrasattva, the dharma-body,

original: 'od gsal ba stong pa nyid bsam gyis me khyab pa la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba stong pa nyid bsam gyis me khyab pa la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: the clear light, emptiness, which is to be entered.

original: 'di ni 'dir rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas me long la dbugs kyis rlangs pa yal ba ltar sa bcu'i dbang phyug sgyu ma'i skus bcu gcig par sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i gnas yongs su gyur pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal du zhugs pa rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas me long la dbugs kyis rlangs pa yal ba ltar sa bcu'i dbang phyug sgyu ma'i skus bcu gcig par sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i gnas yongs su gyur pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal du zhugs pa rab tu bstan to //
translated: Here, by the process of subsequent destruction, as the breath on a mirror vanishes, the lord of the tenth stage enters the clear light, the nature of the transformation of the basis with its obscurations into the eleventh stage, like the illusory body.

original: de nas rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba mtha' dag gi bag chags drungs nas phyung ba ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsod nams dang rang gi smon lam gyis 'phen bas skad cig gis bdag nyid spos pa thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i
analyzed: de nas rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba mtha' dag gi bag chags drungs nas phyung ba ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsod nams dang rang gi smon lam gyis 'phen bas skad cig gis bdag nyid spos pa thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i
translated: Then, by the merit of the disciples and the impetus of one's own prayers, the habitual tendencies of the entire net of conceptual thoughts are uprooted, and in an instant one arises as the great seal of the deity, the nature of which is the great bliss of the emptiness of all extremes, the essence of great compassion.

original: rang bzhin thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rgyun mi 'chad pa sprul pa sna tshogs pa rab 'byams rnams kyis nam mkha'i khongs gang bas gzhan gyi don yang dag par bsgrub par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rgyun mi 'chad pa sprul pa sna tshogs pa rab 'byams rnams kyis nam mkha'i khongs gang bas gzhan gyi don yang dag par bsgrub par 'byung ngo //
translated: This is the uninterrupted enjoyment body of union, which accomplishes the welfare of others through the emanation of infinite varieties of emanations filling the realm of space.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa mchog la gnas pa'i las dang po pas 'di mtha' dag so sor yang dang yang du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa mchog la gnas pa'i las dang po pas 'di mtha' dag so sor yang dang yang du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: A beginner who is abiding in the supreme stage of generation should meditate on all of this individually again and again.

original: 'bring gis ni zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku skad cig gis 'od gsal du zhugs pa dang bzhengs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'bring gis ni zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku skad cig gis 'od gsal du zhugs pa dang bzhengs pa kho na'o //
translated: The middling should meditate only on the enjoyment body of union entering into and arising from lucid clarity in an instant.

original: mchog gi slar zung 'jug gi bdag nyid du bzhengs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: mchog gi slar zung 'jug gi bdag nyid du bzhengs pa kho na'o //
translated: The supreme is the arising in the nature of union alone.

original: 'di nyid lhun gyis grub par bsgom pa mchog gi mchog rab tu gsal ba mthar thug pa zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid lhun gyis grub par bsgom pa mchog gi mchog rab tu gsal ba mthar thug pa zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the supreme of the supreme, the ultimate, the clear light, the attainment of the great seal, the nature of the enjoyment body of union, the spontaneous meditation.

original: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang chen du mdzad pa bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi man ngag gis rang dang mnyam pas kyang dran par bya ba'i phyir mkhas pa 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas rnam par gsal zhing nges par byas pa rang byin gyis brlab pa'iüîΩrim pa'i man ngag go //
analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang chen du mdzad pa bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi man ngag gis rang dang mnyam pas kyang dran par bya ba'i phyir mkhas pa 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas rnam par gsal zhing nges par byas pa rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag go //
translated: This is the secret of the Bhagavat, made clear and certain by the scholar Abhayakaragupta, for the sake of remembering it by those equal to himself, by means of the oral instructions of the feet of the holy guru.

original: 'di las legs byas tshogs rnams kyi //
analyzed: 'di las legs byas tshogs rnams kyi //
translated: This is the oral instruction of the stage of self-consecration.

original: 'jigs med gsung gi 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: 'jigs med gsung gi 'od zer gyis //
translated: By the light rays of the fearless speechüîΩof the accumulations of good deeds from this,

original: myur du 'gro rnams mun bcom zhing ;
analyzed: myur du 'gro rnams mun bcom zhing ;
translated: the darkness of the beings is quickly destroyed.

original: / bde mchog dpal gyi sku 'dzin shog / dngos grub brnyes pa'i pandi ta chen po aa bha y'a ka ra gupta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so /
analyzed: / bde mchog dpal gyi sku 'dzin shog / dngos grub brnyes pa'i pandi ta chen po aa bha y'a ka ra gupta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so /
translated: May I hold the body of glorious Cakrasa·πÉvara.üîΩThis is complete, composed by the great adept and pa·πá·∏çita AbhayƒÅkaragupta.
